Start your day with a delicious breakfast complimented by sweeping city views, enjoy premier shopping and dining just steps from Union Square, and experience effortless travel with valet service and dog-friendly accommodations. Hotel Nikko San Francisco features an impressive 25,000 square feet of versatile meeting and event space designed to leave a lasting impression. Our sophisticated, stylish, and technologically advanced venues provide the perfect setting for everything from business conferences to elegant celebrations. Each space reflects Asian-inspired grace and hospitality, creating an atmosphere that fosters serenity, focus, and collaboration.

","read-more-description":"

Located on the 25th floor, our meeting rooms offer breathtaking views of San Francisco, the bay, and beyondadding inspiration to your gatherings. Modern boardrooms are equipped with state-of-the-art audiovisual technology to support seamless presentations, while our expansive ballrooms transform events into unforgettable experiences.

{"Id":"##Id##","ParentId":"##ParentId##","enable-white-gradient-bg[]":[""],"page-name":"","title":"Modern Comfort Meets Timeless Elegance","description":"

Discover a serene escape in the heart of San Francisco at Hotel Nikko, where refined luxury meets the vibrant energy of Union Square. Rooted in the art of Japanese hospitality, our hotel offers an elegant atmosphere just steps from world-class shopping, dining, and entertainment.

","read-more-description":"

Break a sweat in our premier fitness center, take a soothing dip in our glass-enclosed indoor pool, and indulge in exclusive access to our Imperial Lounge. Stay connected with complimentary high-speed Wi-Fi, enjoy the ease of valet parking, and bring your furry companion along to enjoy our outdoor pet terrace with sweeping city views. From the moment you arrive, Hotel Nikko invites you to relax, indulge, and experience San Francisco at its finest.

{"Id":"##Id##","ParentId":"##ParentId##","enable-gray-gradient-bg[]":["Yes"],"page-name":"","title":"Discover San Francisco's Most Dog-Friendly Hotel","description":"

Known as one of the citys most welcoming dog-friendly destinations, our hotel places you and your pup just steps from nearby dog parks, scenic walking paths, and plenty of pet-friendly patios so you can explore San Francisco together. 

","read-more-description":"

Experience modern comfort on our VIPVery Important Petfloor, featuring luxury accommodations designed with your dog in mind. Enjoy cozy beds, food and water bowls, and healthy treats upon arrival, all thoughtfully provided to help your pup feel right at home. Enjoy morning walks or playtime on our open-air Pet Terrace with an expansive dog run and breathtaking city views.

At Hotel Nikko, dogs arent just allowedtheyre celebrated.

{"Id":"##Id##","ParentId":"##ParentId##","page-name":"","title":"Hotel and Website Accessibility","description":"

Hotel Nikko San Francisco offers accessibility features that ensure every guest feels comfortable and relaxed. We offer accessible facilities, including entrances, restaurants, meeting spaces, and other accommodations.

","read-more-description":"

We also offer accessible entrances and wheelchair seating at our on-site nightclub and cabaret, Feinstein's. Guests with wheelchairs can enter the hotel at the valet entrance on Ellis and Mason, then take the elevator to the lobby level. For questions or requests, please contact us at 1-866-898-4128.

At Hotel Nikko San Francisco, pet pride is part of our hospitality. Your best furry friend enjoys luxury amenities like plush doggie beds, food and water bowls, and a pup-friendly gift bag upon arrival. Take in breathtaking city views while your dog explores the rooftop pet terrace and dog run for walks and potty breaks. Nestled in the heart of Union Square, were just steps from parks, patios, and San Franciscos best dog-friendly spots. So, bring your four-legged family member along for a tail-wagging good time in San Francisco!

{"Id":"##Id##","ParentId":"##ParentId##","enable-gray-gradient-bg[]":["Yes"],"page-name":"","title":"Japanese Inspired Dining in Union Square","description":"

Discover Elevated Union Square Dining at Kanpai Sushi Lounge, Hotel Nikko San Franciscos Newest Culinary Destination.

","read-more-description":"

Nestled in the heart of the city, Kanpai blends the artistry of premium sushi with the elegance of handcrafted sake and rare Japanese whiskies. With a refined ambiance and bold flavors, you will experience a modern fusion of Japanese tradition and California innovation.

Whether you're in search of exceptional cuisine, meaningful connection, or a quiet moment to indulge, Kanpai offers an unforgettable dining experience, thoughtfully crafted in every detail.

{"Id":"##Id##","ParentId":"##ParentId##","enable-gray-gradient-bg[]":["Yes"],"page-name":"","title":"Where Sushi Tells a Story","description":"

Culinary artistry takes the spotlight at Kanpai Lounge, where Japanese precision meets California creativity in every bite. Our menu is a refined journey through texture, flavor, and formrooted in tradition, elevated by imagination.

","read-more-description":"

From pristine sashimi and signature rolls to bold, unexpected fusion dishes, each plate is crafted with locally sourced ingredients and presented with care.

More than a meal, its a celebration of craftsmanship and culturewhere every detail reflects a deep passion for the extraordinary. Savor the sensual, the surprising, the unforgettable. At Kanpai Lounge, sushi becomes a storytold through precision and artistry.

{"Id":"##Id##","ParentId":"##ParentId##","enable-gray-gradient-bg[]":[""],"page-name":"","title":"Union Square Hotel Near Downtown San Francisco","description":"

Ideally situated at the gateway to Union Square, Hotel Nikko places you steps away from San Franciscos premier shopping, dining, and cultural experiences.

Surrounded by stylish boutiques and renowned restaurants, our hotel offers effortless access to the Financial District, Theater District, Chinatown, and the vibrant SoMa neighborhood. At the center of it all, Hotel Nikko embodies the dynamic spirit that makes San Francisco one of the worlds most captivating cities.

{"Id":"##Id##","ParentId":"##ParentId##","enable-gray-gradient-bg[]":[""],"page-name":"","title":"Sustainable Hospitality Starts Here","description":"

Hotel Nikko is proud to be a leader in sustainable hospitality in San Francisco, with a deep commitment to environmental responsibility and community engagement. From composting food waste and conserving water to supporting local initiatives, we aim to make a meaningful impact at every level.

Through thoughtful, eco-conscious practices, we strive to be one of the greenest hotels in the city, working together to protect our neighborhood, our city, and our planet.

{"Id":"##Id##","ParentId":"##ParentId##","enable-gray-gradient-bg[]":[""],"page-name":"Explore the City by the Bay","title":"Things to Do in San Francisco","description":"

Experience the dynamic spirit of San Francisco, a city of iconic landmarks, electrifying culture, and unforgettable attractions. From the world-renowned Golden Gate Bridge to bustling Fishermans Wharf, adventure is always within reach. Just steps from our hotel, discover the upscale shops and dining of Union Square, or ride a classic cable car to Chinatown and North Beach.  

Cross Market Street for world-class art at SFMOMA or catch a San Francisco Giants game at Oracle Park. From Hotel Nikko, the best of the city is right at your doorstep.

Embodying timeless elegance and contemporary sophistication, Hotel Nikko's venues set the stage for your love story. Each space is thoughtfully designed with subtle Asian-inspired touches that bring grace and serenity, making your celebration uniquely unforgettable. Whether exchanging vows in the grand Nikko Ballroom or hosting an intimate dinner in one of our exquisite high-floor rooms with breathtaking city views, every moment is filled with romance and magic. 

","read-more-description":"

Toast your new beginning with a cocktail reception on our stunning outdoor pool deck terracewhether a glamorous affair or a cozy gathering, we provide the ideal setting for your dream San Francisco wedding.

{"Id":"##Id##","ParentId":"##ParentId##","page-name":"","title":"Take San Francisco Home With You","description":"

Browse our online gift shop for the perfect keepsake from your stay in San Francisco. Discover exclusive Hotel Nikko collectibles, unique souvenirs, and memorable experiences you wont find anywhere else. Take home a plush version of Buster, our beloved Canine Operating Officerperfect for kids or dog lovers of any age.

Dont miss our charming hardcover coffee table book, 49 Dogs and One Cat: The Insiders Guide to San Francisco. Told through the eyes of 49 local dogs and one curious cat, Nikko, this beautifully illustrated book captures both iconic landmarks and hidden gems across the city. Best of all, 10% of proceeds support the San Francisco SPCA.

{"Id":"##Id##","ParentId":"##ParentId##","page-name":"Seasonal Packages","title":"Fall in the City by the Bay","description":"

Experience the best of San Francisco all year long with Hotel Nikkos exclusive seasonal packages. From festive holiday dinners to sun-soaked summer escapes, our offers are designed to complement the citys vibrant culture and your travel desires. Savor gourmet cuisine, explore local events, and enjoy luxurious accommodations in the heart of downtown. Whatever the season, make your stay unforgettable with special savings and curated experiences that invite you to eat, drink, and be merry.
